appendix.title: Reference material
appendix.para: In this appendix we show links to reference material used throughout the documentation.

listitem.para: Git repository containing basic Linux infrastructure Puppet modules. It can be expanded with Puppet modules for other functions.
Git repository containing Puppet structure and Puppet configuration parameters to be used as a basis and on the dmsat1 Deployment zone. It can be expanded with parameters from other zones.
Git repository containing software used by Puppet for extra functions, like the Puppet stdlib, GPG support, Puppet lint, etc.

Git repository containing tools used by Puppet to make things easier. For example, it contains a python tool to automatically create DNS resource records from the node YAML files, provided that enough information is put in. Another example is a python tool that automatically creates the Cobbler script for bare metal deployment, also based on the node YAML files.
libvirt is a toolkit to interact with the virtualization capabilities of recent versions of Linux (and other OSes).
